attributes.action: AWARD ALL NHS EMPLOYEES A 15% PAY RISE BY CHRISTMAS 2020.
attributes.additional_details:
OUR NHS colleagues bravely and unimaginably stepped up when the public needed them the most.

They need to be financially rewarded for their very valuable contribution as ESSENTIAL healthcare workers during the COVID-19 pandemic, as well as their continuing efforts in delivering the HIGHEST standards of care within our incredible British NHS system.
attributes.background: We are calling on the government for a significant pay rise (a minimum of 15%) for all NHS staff, to be awarded in 2020 prior to the end of the 3 year pay deal ending in March 2021.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Pay rise for NHS and care staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488

Give NHS staff a pay rise in line with MPs pay increase
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513
